title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever Interview Special
content: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever is finally here: the 30th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and the long-awaited follow-up to the box office-busting worldwide cultural phenomenon that was the first Black Panther, which came out back in 2018. This is an interview special in honour of the film - featuring writer-director Ryan Coogler as well as some of his cast, including Winston Duke, Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o and more - touches on the passing of the late, great Chadwick Boseman as well as what it was like to be caught up in the maelstrom of Black Panther mania when the first film came out.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 1
itunes.subtitle: Ali chats to cast and crew about the latest from the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
